system.description: When you survey the wider world to understand threats, opportunities, or changes, roll +Sleight.

failure.label: Miss (6-)
failure.value: You miss something important, and your ignorance will come back to haunt you.

partial.label: Weak Hit (7-9)
partial.value: You get a sense of the situation. Ask one question from the list below.

success.label: Strong Hit (10+)
success.value: You have a clear picture of the situation. Ask up to two questions from the list below.

system.choices:
• What new opportunities have emerged?
• What threats are gathering against us?
• Which other families are growing stronger?
• What changes are happening in the wider world?
• Where are resources becoming scarce or abundant?
• What new technologies or knowledge have appeared?
